body_html: Thank you for the explanation. For transfer learning, we might initialize few layers and use different optimizer compared to the one pre-trained network was trained on. In that case getting global variables produces an error. It will be nice to include may be the scope from which the user can choose if he/ she wants to initialize global variables or only trainable variables.

body: Thank you for the explanation. For transfer learning, we might initialize few layers and use different optimizer compared to the one pre-trained network was trained on. In that case getting global variables produces an error. It will be nice to include may be the scope from which the user can choose if he/ she wants to initialize global variables or only trainable variables.
